actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to prayer shawls, bags for the keeping of prayer shawls, and certain headwear used in religious observances.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to permit the duty-free entry of prayer shawls, bags for keeping such shawls, and religious headwear.

titles.title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to prayer shawls, bags for the keeping of prayer shawls, and certain headwear used in religious observances.
